title: Yemen’s Houthis say six killed in US strikes on Sanaa province
snippets: The group also claims it shot down a US MQ-9 drone in the airspace of Hajjah governorate.
summary: A group has asserted responsibility for shooting down a US MQ-9 drone over the airspace of Hajjah governorate. The claim indicates a direct action against US military assets, but further details, including verification of the incident and any potential response from the US, have not been provided in the available information.
titles: Yemen’s Houthis say six killed in US strikes on Sanaa province

summary: A suspect is under investigation after their phone was found to contain material related to a neo-Nazi group, along with expressions of praise for Adolf Hitler.

summary: Missile strikes resulted in numerous casualties, with photos and videos revealing bloodied bodies in the streets near the impact sites.

title: Trump warns China ‘not getting off the hook’ on US tariffs for electronics
snippets: The US president says there are no tariff exemptions for electronic items but that they fall under a separate category.
summary: The US President clarified that electronic items will not receive tariff exemptions, categorizing them separately. This distinction affects how electronic goods are treated in terms of trade policies and tariffs.
titles: Trump warns China ‘not getting off the hook’ on US tariffs for electronics

title: Trump in excellent health, says White House doctor
snippets: Doctors also found Trump has scarring "on the right ear from a gunshot wound", after last July's assassination attempt.
summary: Doctors have discovered scarring on the right ear of former President Donald Trump, attributed to a gunshot wound sustained during an assassination attempt in July.
titles: Trump in excellent health, says White House doctor

title: 2025 Masters prize money, purse: Payouts, winnings for Rory McIlroy, each golfer from record $21 million pool

summary: The 89th Masters Tournament has set a record with a $21 million prize fund. The winner, who will be awarded the iconic green jacket, stands to receive a significant portion of this sum. The event marks a historic financial milestone for the golf tournament.
titles: 2025 Masters prize money, purse: Payouts, winnings for Rory McIlroy, each golfer from record $21 million pool

title: Rockets get more clarity on 2025 draft lottery as Suns tie for NBA’s ninth-worst record
snippets: The Rockets will have a top-10 odds slot in the NBA’s May 12 draft lottery thanks to another loss by the Phoenix Suns (36-46) to end their season.
summary: The Houston Rockets secured a top-10 odds slot for the NBA draft lottery scheduled for May 12, following the Phoenix Suns' season-ending loss, which brought their record to 36-46.
titles: Rockets get more clarity on 2025 draft lottery as Suns tie for NBA’s ninth-worst record

title: Former LSU receiver Lacy found dead at age 24
snippets: Former LSU receiver Kyren Lacy was found dead Saturday night in Houston, an LSU official confirmed to ESPN.
summary: Kyren Lacy, a former LSU receiver, was confirmed dead by an LSU official. His body was discovered on Saturday night in Houston. The cause of death has not been disclosed.
titles: Former LSU receiver Lacy found dead at age 24

title: No repeat: Scheffler settles for 4th at Masters, but gains 'something to build off of'
snippets: Scottie Scheffler came to Augusta National this week looking to join Jack Nicklaus as the only players to win three Masters in a four-year span.  Scheffler, the No. 1 player in the world and the pre-tournament favorite, shot a 3-under 69 on Sunday to finish at 8-under 280 in a week where he could never recapture the mojo that led to titles in 2022 and 2024 at Augusta National.  "It was easily a week in which I could have gotten frustrated with either how I was playing or how I was swinging or stuff going on on the course, not hitting it where I was looking," Scheffler said.
summary: Scottie Scheffler, the world's No. 1 golfer, aimed to match Jack Nicklaus' record by winning his third Masters in four years but fell short at Augusta National. Despite being the pre-tournament favorite, Scheffler finished the event with a score of 8-under 280, after shooting a 3-under 69 on Sunday. His performance throughout the week was not enough to secure a victory or replicate his success from 2022 and 2024. Scheffler acknowledged the challenges he faced during the tournament, including potential frustration from his play and conditions on the course.
titles: No repeat: Scheffler settles for 4th at Masters, but gains 'something to build off of'

title: US tech tariff exemption will be temporary, says Trump

summary: The US President announced that certain products previously granted a reprieve will now be categorized under a different regulatory framework. This change signifies a shift in how these products are managed, although specific details about the products or the new regime were not disclosed.
titles: US tech tariff exemption will be temporary, says Trump
